entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
